content.task: SECURITY INFRASTRUCTURE REDESIGN: Current CI security scan failing because we removed bandit-report.json (which contained false positives). Need complete redesign of security scanning approach: 1) Fix artifact upload expecting missing files, 2) Redesign security test workflow to generate reports correctly, 3) Ensure comprehensive security validation without false positives, 4) Maintain enterprise-grade security standards. This is blocking final CI pipeline success.
content.context: Current failure: Security scan expects safety-report.json, bandit-report.json, semgrep-report.json but files were removed due to false positive triggering GitHub secret detection. Need to restructure security workflow to: generate clean reports, exclude false positives properly, maintain artifact uploads, ensure all security tools run correctly. This is the final blocker for complete CI pipeline success.
